channel.title: Data Science on Jude Teves
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science on Jude Teves

item.title: Innovation on the New Normal
item.description: Let’s face it: we are never going back to the way we once were before Covid-19. The world was shaken, countries have staggered, businesses have sunk, and people are gravely aggravated. When the world thought it could take the hit, it was proven wrong. The “Normal” had its loopholes, and the “New Normal” - the new buzzword in town - is making its entourage with a variety of dynamics. In this webinar we will explore on technologies that will introduce new and vast opportunities and help shape our changing needs in a changing world to be… More flexible… More capable… Less vulnerable. This webinar will be in 2 parts. Part 1 will be on May 11 which will revolve around the applications to be introduced by Artificial Intelligence, Big Data, Healthcare Technology, and Virtual/Augmented Reality… And Part 2 will be on May 18, which will revolve around the applications to be introduced by Blockchain, E-Commerce, Financial Technology, and Smart Cities. Different links will be provided for each webinar. Click Interested or Going to be notified! This webinar is on May 11, 6-7:30 PM Philippines/Singapore time. Please make sure to REGISTER for the event beforehand: https://bit.ly/2L5x6MI Zoom link for the webinar here: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/86586336265

item.title: How Computers Understand Human Language
item.description:
Online Masterclass on Natural Language Processing (with E-Certificates)

We invite you to apply in our “Online Masterclass on Natural Language Processing.” You may access the online application form through this link: http://tiny.cc/masterclassNLP

For this session, we will discuss how these so-called smart machines are able to “understand” the human language. Our speaker, Jude Michael Teves from the Philippines, will talk about the fundamentals of NLP, as well as share his experience working on the implementation and management of different related projects as part of ADB’s innovation team.

Meet our Speaker

Jude Michael Teves is an Artificial Intelligence Consultant at the Asian Development Bank (ADB). His current work includes implementing and managing a variety of projects in the fields of computer vision, natural language processing, data analytics, and IoT. In 2019, he earned his Master’s Degree in Data Science at the Asian Institute of Management, where he graduated as Batch Salutatorian with High Distinction, the highest academic award given by the institution.

Event Information

This online session is happening on 2nd May 2020 at 4:00pm – 5:00pm (GMT+8). Only thirty (30) applicants will be selected for this opportunity. The event is absolutely FREE and will take place ONLINE via Zoom. We shall be sending you the meeting invite once accepted.

Deadline of applications is on 30th April 2020, 11:59pm (GMT+8). All confirmed applicants who will attend the seminar will be eligible to receive an electronic certificate signed by the organizers.

Accomplish the online form through this link: http://tiny.cc/masterclassNLP

item.title: Data Science Caravan
item.description:
Our aim is to do the following:

  • discuss the 4th industrial revolution, vis-a-vis the state of data science in the Philippines
  • describe what data science can do to improve the lives of the Filipinos
  • demonstrate various real-world applications of data science in our everyday lives
  • give a workshop on data-driven decision making


The following are pictures taken during the event.
